thread.title: Girl dens blaze fresh trail into Boy Scouts

title: Girl dens blaze fresh trail into Boy Scouts
text:
Girl dens blaze fresh trail into Boy Scouts 10:23am IST - 02:22
After more than a century as a bastion of boyhood, the Boy Scouts of America announced in October that this year it would begin letting girls join the 7- to 10-year-old Cub Scouts. And, as Kat Jackson reports, one Virginia scout unit of girls is on the trail to becoming the first female Scouts in the Boy Scouts of America.
